_comment: Golden dataset for Agent 03 Rotation Detector. Generated from SAMPLE_IBD_STOCKS + PADDING_STOCKS with no sector_patterns.
notes: Sample data is MINING-heavy with high ratings overall. Bull regime (strong tier distribution, high breadth). Only IBD Keep Migration triggers because no cluster holds >40% of keeps (commodity at 38.9%). Leadership Change not triggered because no SectorPatterns provided in test research output.
